titles.en: Chapter 10 – The man rapes the woman of her chastity
Chapter 10 – The man rapes the woman of her chastity

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ وَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ أَبِي أَيُّوبَ عَنْ بُرَيْدٍ الْعِجْلِيِّ قَالَ سُئِلَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ رَجُلٍ اغْتَصَبَ امْرَأَةً فَرْجَهَا قَالَ يُقْتَلُ مُحْصَناً كَانَ أَوْ غَيْرَ مُحْصَنٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father and Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, altogether from Ibn Mahboub, from Abu Ayoub, from Bureyd Al ajaly who said, 
‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> was asked about a man who raped a woman of her chastity. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘He should be killed, whether he was married or without marriage’.

verses.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ حَدِيدٍ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) فِي رَجُلٍ غَصَبَ امْرَأَةً نَفْسَهَا قَالَ قَالَ يُضْرَبُ ضَرْبَةً بِالسَّيْفِ بَلَغَتْ مِنْهُ مَا بَلَغَتْ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Ali Bin Hadeed,f rom Jameel, from Zurara, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> regarding a man who raped a woman of herself. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘He should be struck with the sword, it reaches from it what reaches (whatever may happen from it, whether he lives of dies)’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ جَمِيلٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَحَدِهِمَا ( عليهما السلام ) فِي رَجُلٍ غَصَبَ امْرَأَةً نَفْسَهَا قَالَ يُقْتَلُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, form Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Jameel, from Zurara, 
(It has been narrated either) from one of the two (5<sup>th</sup> or 6<sup>th</sup> Imam<sup>asws</sup>), regarding a man who raped a woman of herself. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘He should be killed’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِذَا كَابَرَ الرَّجُلُ الْمَرْأَةَ عَلَى نَفْسِهَا ضُرِبَ ضَرْبَةً بِالسَّيْفِ مَاتَ مِنْهَا أَوْ عَاشَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, from Abu Baseer, 
Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘When the man forces the woman upon herself, he should be struck with one stroke of the sword, either he dies from it or lives’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي نَجْرَانَ عَنْ جَمِيلِ بْنِ دَرَّاجٍ وَ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ حُمْرَانَ جَمِيعاً عَنْ زُرَارَةَ قَالَ قُلْتُ لِأَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) الرَّجُلُ يَغْصِبُ الْمَرْأَةَ نَفْسَهَا قَالَ يُقْتَلُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Ibn Abu Najran, from Jameel Bin Darraj and Muhammad Bin Humran, altogether, from Zurara who said, 
‘I said to Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, ‘The man rapes the woman of herself’. He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘He should be killed’.
